author: nacho
msg: Porting a patch done for 3.2, into the main branch,
it solves a bug in authorization handling.

author: craigmcc
msg: Fix bug in the way successful authentication was being handled - the
remote user was being set, but the authentication type used was not.

author: larryi
msg: Update to identify web site as the dowload location for connectors, etc.
Remove mention of connectors being part of the source distribution.
Updated JDK and Tomcat default locations.  Now assumes JDK is installed
at its default location, for example c:\jdk1.2.2, and Tomcat binary distribution
is unzipped to the root of the same drive, i.e. c:\jakarta-tomcat.

author: larryi
msg: Update to assume that Tomcat binary distribution is unzipped to root of
Drive C.  Also use Apache's preferred forward slash.
